blogPost.excerpt: DataTorch is a platform for building datasets and experimenting with machine learning algorithms. Organize and annotate data across multiple cloud storages, automate tasks with agents and pipelines, and share your models and data with the wider community!
blogPost.body: DataTorch is a platform for building datasets and experimenting with machine learning algorithms. Organize and annotate data across multiple cloud storages, automate tasks with agents and pipelines, and share your models and data with the wider community!
blogPost.title: DataTorch - Build and share datasets to experiment with ML
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: DataTorch是一个用于构建数据集和实验机器学习算法的平台。在多个云存储中组织和注释数据，利用代理和管道自动执行任务，并与更广泛的社区分享您的模型和数据！您可以在云存储中组织和注释数据，利用代理和管道自动执行任务，并与更广泛的社区分享您的模型和数据。
localize.tagline: 建立和共享数据集，以实验ML。

localize.description: DataTorch是一個用於構建數據集和實驗機器學習算法的平臺。在多個雲存儲中組織和註釋數據，利用代理和管道自動執行任務，並與更廣泛的社區分享您的模型和數據！您可以在雲存儲中組織和註釋數據，利用代理和管道自動執行任務，並與更廣泛的社區分享您的模型和數據。
localize.tagline: 建立和共享數據集，以實驗ML。

previous.excerpt: Resquared is a web app that has data on every local business and makes it easy to reach out to them with built-in marketing tools. If you were trying to sell to restaurants, you’d open Resquared, create a search, and have access to thousands of restaurants.
previous.title: Resquared - Marketing software for reaching local businesses.

localize.description: Resquared是一款网络应用，它拥有当地每家企业的数据，并通过内置的营销工具让你轻松接触到他们。如果你想向餐馆销售，你会打开Resquared，创建一个搜索，并可以访问成千上万的餐馆。
localize.tagline: 覆盖本地企业的营销软件。

localize.description: Resquared是一款網絡應用，它擁有當地每家企業的數據，並通過內置的營銷工具讓你輕鬆接觸到他們。如果你想向餐館銷售，你會打開Resquared，創建一個搜索，並可以訪問成千上萬的餐館。
localize.tagline: 覆蓋本地企業的營銷軟件。

next.excerpt: Understand your users’ behavior and improve your conversions, view hotspots for better call-to-action placements, view user’s cursor trails for understanding your website sales flow. Give your clients analytics they can understand without the learning curve!
next.title: AfterClick.co - Analytics made simple

localize.description: 了解您的用户行为，提高您的转化率，查看热点以获得更好的行动号投放，查看用户的光标轨迹以了解您的网站销售流程。给您的客户提供他们可以理解的分析，而无需学习曲线。
瞭解您的用戶行爲，提高您的轉化率，查看熱點以獲得更好的行動號投放，查看用戶的光標軌跡以瞭解您的網站銷售流程。給您的客戶提供他們可以理解的分析，而無需學習曲線。
